title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Representatives from each member state compose this board, they have authority power. Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank. The President manages the work of the Bank under the guidance of the Board of Directors. ... The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, the European Union and the European Investment Bank.

title: EBRD ‘even more important’ amid global tensions and aid cuts, president says | Euronews
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso dismisses decline of multilateralism as a threat to the mission of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) and foresees a role in post-war Ukraine and Gaza’s post-war recovery.
